name: SproutLabs
0:
”Alexa, ask Sprout Labs which devices are inactive.”
”Alexa, ask Sprout Labs how are my groups doing.”
”Alexa, ask Sprout Labs how are my batteries.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sprout labs
des: Use Alexa to get important information about your Plants / Garden using SproutLabs Devices with embedded sensors such as Humidity, Temperature, Moisture and Sunlight. Make informed decisions about Irrigation based on real data from your Plants / Garden.
